answers.answer: Yes, his diabetes could be a factor in both the erection difficulties and the lack of ejaculate.  Take a look at:* http://diabetes.niddk.nih.gov/dm/pubs/sup/index.htmMrJ

question: Hello, My husband is 44 and diabetic. Blood sugar in the 5 hundred range. Sex is close to nothing cause he can't keep or mantain an erection. I get stressed. We got rid of the porn, and the Trumpet sessions are great,and long lasting. But few. Could his diabetes cause nothing to come out when he cums. That has me worried.please help.Kathie
